definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: file. The first group of settings in this file are the global cache settings.
sentences.chinese: 这个文件中的第一组设置是全局性的高速缓存设置。

sentences.english: We don't forget about the larger picture at any time.
sentences.chinese: 我们任何时刻都没有忘记全局性。

sentences.english: The system is therefore an issue fundamental, overall, stable, and long-term in nature.
sentences.chinese: 制度问题更带有根本性，全局性，稳定性和长期性。

sentences.english: The genetic algorithm is one of the global probability search algorithms.
sentences.chinese: 遗传算法是一种全局性概率搜索算法。

sentences.english: Now let's step back and make some global changes.
sentences.chinese: 下面我们要回过头来做一些全局性的修改。

sentences.english: Strategy in broad sense means the overall or long term strategy and design of the war.
sentences.chinese: 广义上的战略则是指带全局性或长远性的运筹和谋划。

sentences.english: The global analysis of this model becomes more complex.
sentences.chinese: 该模型的全局性态的分析显得更加复杂。

definition: major policy of the national government
